dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5640 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12804 Chillicothe Road in Chesterland, Ohio, as the “Sgt. Wolfgang Kyle Weninger Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Joyce of Ohio (for himself, Mr. Landsman, Mr. Wenstrup, Mrs. Beatty, Mr. Jordan, Mr. Latta, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mr. Miller of Ohio, Mr. Davidson, Ms. Kaptur, Mr. Turner, Ms. Brown, Mr. Balderson, Mr. Carey, and Mrs. Sykes) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12804 Chillicothe Road in Chesterland, Ohio, as the Sgt. Wolfgang Kyle Weninger Post Office Building.

section.header: Sgt. Wolfgang Kyle Weninger Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12804 Chillicothe Road in Chesterland, Ohio, shall be known and designated as the Sgt. Wolfgang Kyle Weninger Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sgt. Wolfgang Kyle Weninger Post Office Building.
